AND Remaining distance ≤201m AND Remaining distance 
≥199m AND Position ≥4 AND In leading 70%
</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を回復し\\nさらに速:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +5,5%, Target Speed +0,25m/s for 
5s</color> when: After 50% distance AND Middle leg 
AND Position ≥3 AND In leading 70%
</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで前の方を\\nキープすると気分を爆アゲして持久力を\: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +5,5%, Target Speed +0,25m/s for 6s</color> when: \nAfter 50% distance AND order_rate_in20_continue == 1\n</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると強い意志で速度が上がる\\n先頭が:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,45m/s for 5s</color> when:

+0,35m/s for 5s</color> when: is_last_straight_onetime == 1 AND 
Position ≥2 AND Position ≤5 AND distance_diff_top>5
</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3\\nコーナーで速度を少し上げる、または\\n終:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,25m/s, Acceleration +0,3m/s² for 5s</color> 
when: Final leg AND straight_front_type == 2 AND

distance AND On straight AND Position ≤2
</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n強い想: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,35m/s for 5s</color> when: Remaining distance \n≤300m AND In leading 40% AND ≤1 length(s) behind\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\nこの瞬間に懸け持久力をわずかに使い\\: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,45m/s, Current HP -1% for 4s</color> when: Final \ncorner/straight AND On straight AND ≤1 length(s) ahead\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\:

distance ≤300m AND In leading 40% <color=#29b39e>after</color>: 
Final corner/straight AND Overtook
</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をわ: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 5s</color> when: After 50% distance \nAND In trailing 60% AND In leading 80%\n</size>
text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで速度を少し\\n上げ、さらに能力を引き出すスキルの\\n:

leg later half (random)

text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\nよりリラックスして持久力が回復する: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +5,5% immediately</color> when: Middle leg AND \nPosition ≥2 AND In leading 70% AND Use ≥2 skills (mid)\n</size>

text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで\\n速度をちょっと上げる: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s for 3s</color> when: \nMiddle leg later half (random)\n</size>
text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\n持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +1,5% immediately</color> when: Middle leg AND \nPosition ≥2 AND In leading 70% AND Use ≥2 skills (mid)\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に\\n前の方で追いすがっていると\\n最終直線を走行中速度が少:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,25m/s for 3s</color> when: Final corner/straight 
AND On straight <color=#29b39e>after</color>: Final corner/straight AND 
Overtaking AND Position ≤5 AND In leading 50% AND 
overtake_target_no_order_up_time >= 2
</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復すると\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\nわずかに速度: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: After 50% distance \nAND Recover HP 1+ times AND Position ≤3\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n少しの間速度が少し上がる: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,25m/s for 2.4s</color> when: Final \ncorner/straight AND Overtook AND In leading 40%\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\nちょっと呼:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Acceleration +0,1m/s², 
Current HP +0,5% for 3s</color> when: Recover HP 
3+ times AND After 50% distance
</size>
text.レース後半に速度をほんのわずかに上げ\\nさらに使用可能なレアスキルを1つ\\n: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,04m/s, Activate Rare Skill +1 for 3s</color> \nwhen: distance_rate_after_random==50\n</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\nわずかに上げる、さらに先頭のウマ娘と:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s, Special +0,04 for 3s</color> when: 
distance_diff_top<=5 AND Position ≥2 AND In leading 40% 
AND Remaining distance ≤201m AND Remaining distance 
≥199m <color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Position ≥2 AND 
In leading 40% AND Remaining distance ≤201m AND 
Remaining distance ≥199m
</size>
text.中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\n持久力を少し回復する: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +3,5% immediately</color> when: Middle leg AND \nOvertaken AND In trailing 60%\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\\n詰め寄られると速度をわずかに上げ続ける:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3.6s</color> when: Final 
corner/straight AND HP% ≤45 AND Position 
≤3 AND In leading 50% AND ≤1 length(s) ahead 
AND Is overtake target for ≥1s
</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\n加速力をわずかに上げる:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Acceleration +0,2m/s² for 2.4s</color> when: Final 
corner/straight AND In corner AND Overtaking AND 
Position ≥4 AND In leading 75%
</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと少しの間\\n速度をわずかに上げる、それまでに7回\\:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,25m/s for 2.4s</color> when: Remaining distance 
≤401m AND Remaining distance ≥399m AND In leading 40% 
AND Use ≥7 skills <color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 2.4s</color> when: 
Remaining distance ≤401m AND Remaining distance ≥399m 
AND In leading 40% AND Use ≤6 skills
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で\\n詰め寄られるとわずかに速度を上げる: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Final corner/straight \nAND In leading 40% AND Is overtake target for ≥2s\n</size>
text.レース中盤で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に速度がわずかに上がる: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Middle leg AND \nPosition ≥3 AND In leading 50% AND Overtaking\n</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると速度を\\nわずかに上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\nさ:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s, Acceleration +0,05m/s² 
for 3s</color> when: Final leg or later AND On straight 
AND Position ≤2 AND straight_front_type == 2 
<color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Final leg or 
later AND On straight AND Position ≤2
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に好位置にいると\\n速度をわずかに上げゴールまで遠い場合\:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s, Acceleration +0,05m/s² for 3s</color> 
when: Remaining distance ≥401m AND Final leg or later 
AND Final corner/straight AND In trailing 80% AND In 
leading 40% <color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Final leg 
or later AND Final corner/straight AND In trailing 80% 
AND In leading 40%
</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けると\\nレース中盤に速度を:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Stayed in 
top 40% AND Middle leg AND After 50% distance 
AND Position ≥2 AND In leading 40%
</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後\\nろの方で抜くと加速力がわずかに上がる:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Final corner/straight 
AND In corner AND In leading 40% AND Overtook 
<color=#e06f0b>Acceleration +0,2m/s² for 2.4s</color> when: Final 
corner/straight AND In corner AND In trailing 50% AND 
In leading 80% AND Overtook
</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘がいるとほんのわずかに\\n息を:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s, Current HP +0,4% 
for 3s</color> when: Position ≤4 AND Middle leg 
AND In corner AND ≤3 length(s) ahead
</size>
text.レース中盤を好位置で走行中に\\n詰め寄られると前方のウマ娘から\\n持久力をわ:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Current HP +1,5%, Current HP -0,3% to All ahead 
immediately</color> when: Middle leg AND Position ≥2 AND In 
leading 50% AND Is overtake target for ≥1s
</size>
text.ラストスパートの最終直線に中団以降で\\n速度をちょっとずつ上げ、効果中スキル\:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Target Speed +0,05m/s for 3.6s</color> 
when: Last spurt AND Final corner/straight AND On 
straight AND In trailing 60%
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度をわずかに上げ続ける:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3.6s</color> when: 
change_order_up_finalcorner_after >= 3 AND Final 
corner/straight AND On straight
</size>
text.残り350mを切って\\n前の方で後ろのウマ娘との距離が近いと\\nちょっと抜け:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Acceleration +0,1m/s² for 3s</color> 
when: Remaining distance ≤350m AND In leading 40% AND 
In trailing 80% AND ≤1 length(s) ahead
</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\nちょっと抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Acceleration +0,1m/s² 
for 3s</color> when: Final corner/straight AND In 
corner AND In trailing 70% AND In leading 
70% AND Blocked (side) for ≥2s
</size>
text.最終直線を好位置で走行中\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\nちょっと抜け出しや:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Acceleration +0,1m/s² for 3s</color> 
when: Final corner/straight AND On straight AND 
Position ≤4 AND ≤1 length(s) behind
</size>
text.レース中間付近で先頭付近だと速度が\\nちょっとずつ上がる、ダートレースでは\\:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s, Current HP +0,5% for 3.6s</color> 
when: After 40% distance AND Before 50% distance 
AND ≤10% from leader AND Dirt <color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s 
for 3.6s</color> when: After 40% distance AND Before 50% 
distance AND ≤10% from leader
</size>
text.レース終盤で最終直線が迫ったとき\\n中団から速度をわずかに上げる:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: Final leg or later 
AND Final corner/straight (2nd half) AND In leading 75% 
AND In trailing 60%
</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s for 3s</color> when: Final corner/straight \nAND In corner AND Distance to first ≥7m\n</size>
text.レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\n幸運パワーが身体に実り\\n速度がわずかに: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: After 50% distance \nAND In trailing 60% AND Is overtake target for ≥2s\n</size>
text.終盤目前の下り坂で中団に控えていて\\nゴールまで遠いと\\n速度をわずかに上げ:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s</color> when: After 60% distance 
AND Downhill AND Middle leg AND In trailing 60% AND In 
leading 80% AND Remaining distance ≥500m
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線中団から速度をわずかに上げる\:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3.6s</color> when: Final 
corner/straight AND On straight AND In trailing 60% AND 
In leading 70% AND popularity >= 4 <color=#29b39e>after</color>: Final 
corner/straight AND Overtook <color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,15m/s for 
3s</color> when: Final corner/straight AND On straight AND In 
trailing 60% AND In leading 70% AND popularity < 4 <color=#29b39e>after</color>
: Final corner/straight AND Overtook
</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n加速力が:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Acceleration +0,2m/s² for 2.4s</color> when: Final 
corner/straight AND On straight <color=#29b39e>after</color>: After 
50% distance AND order_rate_out70_continue 
== 1 AND Was tempted 0 times
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナーでスキルを発動すると\\n速度をちょっと上げる\\n中山レース場:
<size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,25m/s for 3s</color> when: Final leg or 
later AND Final corner/straight AND In corner 
AND is_activate_any_skill == 1 <color=#29b39e>after</color>: Track 10005 
<color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,05m/s for 3s</color> when: Final leg or 
later AND Final corner/straight AND In corner 
AND is_activate_any_skill == 1
</size>
text.レース後半に先団にいると残りの\\n持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Target Speed +0,04m/s for 3s</color> when: After 50% distance \nAND In leading 40%\n</size>
text.芝・中距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Wisdom stat +60 indefinitely</color> when: Medium AND Grass\n</size>
text.芝・長距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Stamina stat +60 indefinitely</color> when: Long AND Grass\n</size>
text.芝・マイルレースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=18><color=#e06f0b>Power stat +60 indefinitely</color> when: Mile AND Grass\n</size>
